          <div class="custom-item-inner">

            <img alt="spin shoes roundup" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ride-spinshoes-lede1-1610145444.jpg?crop=0.498xw:0.997xh;0.502xw,0.00326xh&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ride-spinshoes-lede1-1610145444.jpg?crop=0.498xw:0.997xh;0.502xw,0.00326xh&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ride-spinshoes-lede1-1610145444.jpg?crop=0.498xw:0.997xh;0.502xw,0.00326xh&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ride-spinshoes-lede1-1610145444.jpg?crop=0.498xw:0.997xh;0.502xw,0.00326xh&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ride-spinshoes-lede1-1610145444.jpg?crop=0.498xw:0.997xh;0.502xw,0.00326xh&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="THE TEST ZONE" data-vars-position="3" href="/bikes-gear/g35100184/spin-shoes/">

            </a>

         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Coronavirus Coverage" data-vars-position="4" href="/health-nutrition/a33634077/exercise-myocarditis-and-covid-19/">
           <img alt="cycling with mask, coronavirus, covid 19" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/protector-carbon-disposable-respirator-mask-royalty-free-image-1598282672.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0585xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/protector-carbon-disposable-respirator-mask-royalty-free-image-1598282672.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0585xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/protector-carbon-disposable-respirator-mask-royalty-free-image-1598282672.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0585xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/protector-carbon-disposable-respirator-mask-royalty-free-image-1598282672.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0585xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/protector-carbon-disposable-respirator-mask-royalty-free-image-1598282672.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.0585xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="myocarditis and COVID-19"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Coronavirus Coverage" data-vars-position="4" href="/health-nutrition/a33634077/exercise-myocarditis-and-covid-19/">
            Exercising With COVID-19 Can Be a Dangerous Combo
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

       <div class="custom-item introducing-the-new-bicycling text-under">

           Introducing the New Bicycling
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">

            We're launching new benefits to make you a stronger, healthier, and faster cyclist.
           </p>

      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <a href="https://www.bicycling.com/training/">
          Build a Strong Core
         </a>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="44fe389b-aa9e-44bb-b914-35eb8d1366d3" data-vars-block-slot="10" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item abs-exercise-v-ups image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Build a Strong Core" data-vars-position="1" href="/training/a28937899/abs-exercise-v-ups/">
           <img alt="v ups" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/side-v-up-workout-shoot-1297-1601407012.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/side-v-up-workout-shoot-1297-1601407012.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/side-v-up-workout-shoot-1297-1601407012.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/side-v-up-workout-shoot-1297-1601407012.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/side-v-up-workout-shoot-1297-1601407012.jpg?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Build a Strong Core" data-vars-position="1" href="/training/a28937899/abs-exercise-v-ups/">
            Switch Things Up With These V-Up Variations
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item yoga-inspired-mobility-workout image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Build a Strong Core" data-vars-position="2" href="/training/a34439776/yoga-inspired-mobility-workout/">
           <img alt="mobility workout" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/2020-bicycling-bicycling-fitness-ep23-mobility-dm-v06-00-04-47-11-still002-1607358308.jpg?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.239xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/2020-bicycling-bicycling-fitness-ep23-mobility-dm-v06-00-04-47-11-still002-1607358308.jpg?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.239xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/2020-bicycling-bicycling-fitness-ep23-mobility-dm-v06-00-04-47-11-still002-1607358308.jpg?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.239xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/2020-bicycling-bicycling-fitness-ep23-mobility-dm-v06-00-04-47-11-still002-1607358308.jpg?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.239xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/2020-bicycling-bicycling-fitness-ep23-mobility-dm-v06-00-04-47-11-still002-1607358308.jpg?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.239xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="mobility for cyclists"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Build a Strong Core" data-vars-position="2" href="/training/a34439776/yoga-inspired-mobility-workout/">
            A Yoga-Inspired Mobility Workout for Better Riding
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item medicine-ball-crunch-circuit image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Build a Strong Core" data-vars-position="3" href="/training/a34833442/medicine-ball-crunch-circuit/">

        <div class="custom-item mountain-biking-tips-for-beginners">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="MORE FROM BICYCLING" data-vars-position="9" href="/skills-tips/a20026941/mountain-biking-tips-for-beginners/">

			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
